content.text:
# Timeline of the Battle of Mosul (2016–2017)

The timeline of the Battle of Mosul (2016–2017) is divided into the three phases.
* Timeline of the Battle of Mosul (2016–2017): Phase One (October to December, 2016)
* Timeline of the Battle of Mosul (2016–2017): Phase Two (December 2016 to February 2017)
* Timeline of the Battle of Mosul (2016–2017): Phase Three (February to July, 2017)
External links
* [http://syriancivilwarmap.com/ Interactive Syria and Iraq map with current Mosul military situation]
* [http://isis.liveuamap.com/ ISIS news map]
* [http://www.cnn.com/2016/11/05/middleeast/iraq-inside-mosul-battle/ CNN report – 28 hours: Leading the Mosul attack, under fire, then trapped], November 2016
* [https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?mid=1b8Nfs3pWEKxFotW5_91engr9n8s&ll=36.36518764353825%2C43.09335683408199&z=13 Map of all restored Mosul city districts – with timeline notes attached for each district], published by Google Maps
